fields.title: Mr. Bean's Holiday
fields.review: Mr Bean's Holiday is an excellent family movie! It has the usual slapstick moments which are funny and sometimes inappropriate behaviour.

fields.title: Spider-Man 3
fields.review: Spider-Man 3 is a great action movie! It easily had the best action, not just because of the amount of villains, but because of the way they were choreographed.

fields.title: The Terminator
fields.review: The Terminator is sensational sci-fi thriller film! It has great plot and also the feel of the classic 80's action movie.

fields.title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'
fields.review: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' is a marvelous Japanese animated movie! It has great design and a storyline with the element of surprise.

fields.title: Home Alone
fields.review: This is a good-natured, albeit unrealistic family film that both kids and adults will enjoy especially during the Christmas season. It has a funny plot and also some managable violance.

fields.title: Top Gun: Maverick
fields.review: This movie pictures the adventures of the top gun very nicely with quite great attraction ability, overall very good.

fields.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
fields.review: The relations between Eddie and Venom became very close after the first movie. In this one it introduces a new villain, namely Carnage. The sound effect of this film is great.

fields.title: Jurassic World Dominion
fields.review: For people that quite like gigantic animals, especially Jurassic Park enthusiast, this is a movie for you.

fields.title: The Hobbit
fields.review: This movie is quite nice! It's definitely no Lord of The Rings type of quality but it's still a pretty cool movie. Sure, it took it's time to try to tell the story, but in the end it's enjoyable.

fields.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
fields.review: This is the movie about Thor after the Endgame. Overall a good film, but to me it kind of feels empty in a way.
